content:
SearchIndexClient SearchIndexClient Class

In this Article

Edit

Client that can be used to query an Azure Search index and upload, merge, or delete documents.

Syntax

Declaration

public class SearchIndexClient : ServiceClient<SearchIndexClient>, ISearchIndexClient, IDisposable, IAzureClientPublic Class SearchIndexClient
    Inherits ServiceClient(Of SearchIndexClient)
    Implements ISearchIndexClient, IDisposable, IAzureClient

AcceptLanguage

Gets or sets the preferred language for the response.
ApiVersion
ApiVersion

Client Api Version.
BaseUri
BaseUri

The base URI of the service.
Credentials
Credentials

Credentials needed for the client to connect to Azure.
DeserializationSettings
DeserializationSettings

Gets or sets json deserialization settings.
Documents
Documents

Gets the IDocumentsOperations.
GenerateClientRequestId
GenerateClientRequestId

When set to true a unique x-ms-client-request-id value is generated and included in each request. Default is true.
LongRunningOperationRetryTimeout
LongRunningOperationRetryTimeout

Gets or sets the retry timeout in seconds for Long Running Operations. Default value is 30.
SearchCredentials
SearchCredentials

Gets the credentials used to authenticate to an Azure Search service.
SerializationSettings
SerializationSettings

Gets or sets json serialization settings.
UseHttpGetForQueries
UseHttpGetForQueries

Indicates whether the index client should use HTTP GET for making Search and Suggest requests to the Azure Search REST API. The default is false, which indicates that HTTP POST will be used.

Methods summary

TargetDifferentIndex(String)
TargetDifferentIndex(String)

Changes the BaseUri of this client to target a different index in the same Azure Search service. This method is NOT thread-safe; You must guarantee that no other threads are using the client before calling it.
